text: Arau yidina te'om sihamta sakaloke ekatraita karaiba arau ka’ba, ‘he jbina sampradaya! Tomaloke bahuto lokaka pathabhrasta karaichila’, arau manuhara majara paraa sihamtara bandhusakale ka’ba, ‘he amara raba! Amara majara kichusankhyake ana kichusankhyakara paraa labhabana haiche arau tumi amara babe yi samaya nirdharana karaichila etiya ami tata upanita haicho’. Allahe ka’ba, ‘jahanname'i tomalokara basasthana, tomaloke tata cirakala thakiba’, kintu allahe (uli'oraara) iccha karaile seya sukiya katha. Niscaya tomara raba prajnamaya, sarbajna
